title: Predicting the NBA's Most Valuable Player
excerpt: In the NBA, no honor is more important than the Most Valuable Player (MVP) award. After all, in order to be recognized one of the best basketball players of all time, a player must have won the award at least once. Although the award is typically ...
content:
In the NBA, no honor is more important than the Most Valuable Player (MVP) award. After all, in order to be recognized one of the best basketball players of all time, a player must have won the award at least once. Although the award is typically given by members of the media, a playerâ€™s MVP narrative is often reflected in their basketball statistics. In this blog, I attempt to build a model capable of predicting the next MVP using simple and advanced basketball statistics.


This project is not finished yet.

Introduction
